stream.title: Change existing rental order to a change-over
stream.description:
When a container/skip is delivered to a customer on a regular occurance it's classed as a "change-over":

  • A skip is delivered
  • A driver collects it at a later date and drops off a new one at the same time
  • The process is repeated until the customer no longer requires the service.
To create a "change over", load up your instance of Stream.
For for this example, we'll use the YPH dev slot
Now follow these steps:
